General.Name: Sunac China Holdings Limited
General.Description: Sunac China Holdings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate industry. The company involved in the development of real estate, property management, ice and snow operation management, cultural tourism, and other business segments. Sunac China Holdings Limited was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
